[bq="gasmaskangel"]"@Shadow the Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/558a12006368727fa9003002#post_558a12006368727fa9003002
Fun fact: The average life span for a hedgehog is 2-5 years.[/bq]
You mean just like Sonic's periods of good games?

Sonic 1 - 3&K = 3 years
SA1 - Heroes = 5 years
Sonic Unleashed - Generations = 3 years

Nothing of interest in between (unless it's the handheld games which have been consistently decent throughout the years)
